languages.text: {n}Брови Кибеллы неодобрительно хмурятся.{/n} "Я лишь Его возмездное копье — не ведьма, не колдунья, не провидица. Во мне нет особых сил, но на мне лежит Его Благословение. Я не повелеваю завесой, меня направляет шепот Его. Вера моя. Завет Паутины. Прошу, не смущай более мой разум подобными замечаниями".

{n}Kibellah's brow furrows.{/n} "I am the spear of His retribution, not a witch, or a sorcerer, or a soothsayer. I have no strange powers, but I do bear His blessing. I do not command the veil, I am guided by His whisper and led by my faith. By the Tenets. Please, do not mistake me for something I am not."
languages.original_text: {n}Брови Кибеллы неодобрительно хмурятся.{/n} "Я лишь Его возмездное копье — не ведьма, не колдунья, не провидица. Во мне нет особых сил, но на мне лежит Его Благословение. Я не повелеваю завесой, меня направляет шепот Его. Вера моя. Завет Паутины. Прошу, не смущай более мой разум подобными замечаниями".

I do not command the veil, I am guided by His whisper. By my faith. By Ahn'shini. Please, do not try to disturb me with such remarks again."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah arruga el entrecejo.{/n} «Soy la lanza de Su mano justiciera, no una bruja, hechicera o adivina. Carezco de poderes sobrenaturales, pero tengo Su bendición. No controlo el velo, sino que obedezco Sus susurros y es mi fe lo que me guía. Eso es la Doctrina. Le ruego que no me tome por algo que no soy».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows.{/n} "I am the spear of His retribution, not a witch, or a sorcerer, or a soothsayer. I have no strange powers, but I do bear His blessing. I do not command the veil, I am guided by His whisper and led by my faith. By the Tenets. Please, do not mistake me for something I am not."

No controlo el velo, sino que obedezco Sus susurros y es mi fe lo que me guía. Eso es la Doctrina. Le ruego que no me tome por algo que no soy».

languages.text: {n}キベラが眉根を寄せる。{/n}「私は主の報復の槍なのであって、魔女でもソーサラーでも預言者でもない。私は不思議な力は持たないけれど、主の祝福を受けている。私がヴェールに命じることはなく、主の囁きに導かれ、自身の信仰に導かれる。そう、教義によって。お願いだから、私を私ではない何かと間違えないで」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows.{/n} "I am the spear of His retribution, not a witch, or a sorcerer, or a soothsayer. I have no strange powers, but I do bear His blessing. I do not command the veil, I am guided by His whisper and led by my faith. By the Tenets. Please, do not mistake me for something I am not."

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈眉头紧锁。{/n}“我是祂手中的利矛。我不是女巫，不是巫师，也不是预言家。我没有那些古怪的力量，但我确实得到了祂的祝福。我从不会向面纱下达命令，而会让祂的低语引导我，让我的信念引导我，让我的教义引导我。请不要把我当成别的什么人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows.{/n} "I am the spear of His retribution, not a witch, or a sorcerer, or a soothsayer. I have no strange powers, but I do bear His blessing. I do not command the veil, I am guided by His whisper and led by my faith. By the Tenets. Please, do not mistake me for something I am not."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈眉头紧锁。{/n}“我是祂手中的利矛。我不是女巫，不是巫师，也不是预言家。我没有那些古怪的力量，但我确实得到了祂的祝福。我从不会向面纱下达命令，而会让祂的低语引导我，让我的信念引导我，让我的教义引导我。请不要把我当成别的什么人。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ich bin der Speer Seiner Vergeltung, keine Hexe, keine Zauberin, keine Wahrsagerin. Ich habe keine merkwürdigen Kräfte, aber ich trage Seinen Segen. Ich befehlige nicht den Schleier, aber ich werde geleitet von Seinem Flüstern und geführt von meinem Glauben. Von den Grundsätzen. Haltet mich bitte nicht für etwas, das ich nicht bin."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows.{/n} "I am the spear of His retribution, not a witch, or a sorcerer, or a soothsayer. I have no strange powers, but I do bear His blessing. I do not command the veil, I am guided by His whisper and led by my faith. By the Tenets. Please, do not mistake me for something I am not."

Ich habe keine merkwürdigen Kräfte, aber ich trage Seinen Segen. Ich befehlige nicht den Schleier, aber ich werde geleitet von Seinem Flüstern und geführt von meinem Glauben. Von den Grundsätzen. Haltet mich bitte nicht für etwas, das ich nicht bin."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Je suis la lance chargée d'exécuter Son châtiment, pas une sorcière ou une diseuse de bonne aventure. Je ne possède pas de pouvoirs occultes, mais je porte en moi Sa bénédiction. Je ne commande pas au voile, je m'en remets entièrement à Ses murmures et à ma foi. Aux Préceptes. Je vous saurais gré de ne pas me prendre pour ce que je ne suis pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows.{/n} "I am the spear of His retribution, not a witch, or a sorcerer, or a soothsayer. I have no strange powers, but I do bear His blessing. I do not command the veil, I am guided by His whisper and led by my faith. By the Tenets. Please, do not mistake me for something I am not."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Ben O'nun intikamının mızrağıyım. Cadı, sahir veya falcı değilim. Tuhaf güçlerim yoktur ancak O'nun lütfunu taşırım. Örtüye yön vermem. O'nun fısıltısı kılavuzumdur. İnancım ve İlkeler bana yol gösterir. Lütfen beni olmadığım bir şey sanma."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's brow furrows.{/n} "I am the spear of His retribution, not a witch, or a sorcerer, or a soothsayer. I have no strange powers, but I do bear His blessing. I do not command the veil, I am guided by His whisper and led by my faith. By the Tenets. Please, do not mistake me for something I am not."
